p: The inhibitory effects of the isolated compound against rat intestinal α-glucosidase and porcine pancreas α-amylase were evaluated in comparison with the antidiabetic acarbose. The isolated α-viniferin showed an active α-glucosidase and α-amylase inhibitory activities with IC 50 values of 256.17 and 212.79 μg/mL, respectively. The in vitro antiplasmodial activity test against Plasmodium falciparum at a concentration of 100 μg/mL revealed a strong antiplasmodial inhibitory activity with IC 50 value of 2.76 μg/mL.
